article_title: Detectives investigating deadly shooting near Buffalo medical campus
article_text:
BUFFALO, N.Y. (WIVB) — Homicide detectives are investigating a deadly shooting at the McCarley Gardens Apartment complex, near Roswell Park Cancer Institute.

Yolonzol Green, Jr. of Buffalo, 24, was shot at several times around 3:30 a.m. Saturday. The victim was taken to ECMC, where he later died. There are currently no suspects in custody.

If you have any information, you are asked to call the Buffalo Police confidential TIPCALL line at 847-2255.
